title: Extended Product Detail Page UI Schema
description: Covers variations in product details such as size, color, scent, availability, shipping tags, and user interactions.

elements.label: Product Name
elements.action: displays the title of the selected product

elements.label: Product Images
elements.action: displays a carousel or gallery of images

elements.label: Price
elements.action: displays base price and sale price if available

elements.label: Free Shipping
elements.action: shown if product qualifies for free delivery

elements.label: Out of Stock
elements.action: hides 'Add to Cart' and disables quantity selectors

elements.label: Reviews and Rating
elements.action: displays average rating and list of reviews

elements.label: Select Size
elements.action: required for products with size variations

elements.label: Select Color/Shades
elements.action: required if product has color variants

elements.label: Quantity
elements.action: set desired quantity before adding to cart

elements.label: Add to Cart
elements.action: adds product with selected options to cart
